title: Foreign Language Fonts
content:
Hi !!!  
Im in search of Asian Language (India), “Malayalam” font family consisting of atleast regular and bold.  
i could even buy it if i find a family of the fonts.  
If anybody could provide any links it would be great !!!  
Thanx !!!
author: Ibrahim B

comments.content: Kartika, a Malayalam font that has been supplied with Windows for some time, now has a bold version in Windows 7.

im not using windows, im using mac.  
is there any website where i can download or buy Malayalam Fonts of regular, medium and bold weight ?

FWIW, Ascender also sells Kartika; but only one weight it seems.  
I wonder if/when the Bold might be added.  
 [http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/kartika-malayalam.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103030807/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/kartika-malayalam.aspx "http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/kartika-malayalam.aspx")

Mac’s can’t use Windows fonts for complex scripts like Malayalam. There are only two sources:

[http://www.xenotypetech.com/osxMalayalam.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103030807/http:/www.xenotypetech.com/osxMalayalam.html "http://www.xenotypetech.com/osxMalayalam.html")
